content.rendered:
Directed by Anoop Sathyan

Written by Sairam Vishwa

Cast Shobana (Neena). Suresh Gopi (Major Unnikrishnan). Kalyani Priyadarshan (Nikitha). Dulquer Salmaan (Bibeesh P. aka Fraud). Sarvajith Santosh Sivan (Karthik). Urvashi (Dr. Sherly). Johny Antony (Dr. Bose). Lalu Alex (Manuel). K.P.A.C. Lalitha (Aakashavani). Lal Jose (Siva Prasad). Major Ravi (Major Aatmaram). Rahul Rajasekharan (Aby). Siju Wilson (Alphonse Antony). Theni Murugan (Gangayamaran). K. Gopal (House Owner). Vidhya Menon Ahamed (Dhanya). Sruthy Anand (Jealous Dancer). Deepa Bhaskar (Gangayamaran’s Wife). Krishna Chandran (Ranjan). Midhun Chettoor (Patient). Melvin Dennis (Salesman). Eldho (Bibeesh’s Father). Nazar Abdul Hussain (Matrimony Office Boy). Sujai James (Priest). Bindhu Jayan (Elizabeth). Kripa Jayaram (Neethu). Kurian Joseph John (Flat Boy). Jibin V. Joseph (Friend). Kamatchi Kaleeswaran (Chinnu). Wafa Khatheeja (Wafa).Meera Krishnan. Maheswari (Nikitha (Child)). Shefeek P. Moosa (2nd Swiggy Guy). Naslen (Bibeesh (Teen) (as Nalsen K. Gafoor)). Nimisha (Bibeesh’s Mother). Lali P.M.(Geetha). Bibin Perumbillikunnel (Serial Guy). Shalvika Prakash (Flat Girl). V. Ramanathan (Repair Thatha). Mirunalleni Reddy (French Class Student). Asha Rema (Singer in the Climax). Sandra Rodrigues (French Professer). Varsha Sivaraj (Singer in the Climax). Shyam Soni (Apartment Security). Sreeja (Cooker Amma). Jagadeesh Srinishanth (Wafa’s Boyfriend). Vijayshree Venkatraman (Studio Lady). Niven Venkitachalam (French Class Student). Sairam Vishwa (French Class Student). Odukkathil Viswajith (1st Swiggy Guy). Yug (Aatmaram’s Grandson)

Languages Malayalam

Producers Dulquer Salmaan

Production M Star Satellite Communication. Wayfarer Film
